TopicTitle: BUG: active and archived Contracts are forgotten(lost)

Articles.Content:
Version: 1.3.1.1891; Windows; x64; en-us; with Steam; no mods at all

Active and archived Contracts are lost when a building is entered and instantly left again.

Tested for Spaceplane Hangar, VAB and Tracking Station as they load slow enough to be ready to click on the exit button on the top right. The more crafts are loaded in the map the easier it gets but it works even with a fresh career and no crafts.

Solution: Take it easy and some time.
